column1:
List of User Agents for which Currency Auto Switcher should be disabled. Enter one User Agent per line
Example:
gsa-crawler
Googlebot*
column2:
List of User Agents for which Currency Auto Switcher should be disabled. Enter one User Agent per line
Example:
gsa-crawler
Googlebot*

column1:
Exception URLs are relative URLs to your Store URL used mainly to disable Currency Auto Switcher for payment processing gateways.
Enter one URL per line.
* means anything
Example:
/paypal/*
/twocheckout/*
column2:
Exception URLs are relative URLs to your Store URL used mainly to disable Currency Auto Switcher for payment processing gateways.
Enter one URL per line.
* means anything
Example:
/paypal/*
/twocheckout/*
